issue.title: hdfs block locations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1320](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1320). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To provide a function which can return the set of machines on which the data blocks of a given hdfs file are stored. This is best for scheduling systems (e.g., dask) which can move the computation to the machine which has the data, and so cut out network data traffic.
